Name: Rachel L. Rowell
Review: I work from my home office and sitting so long, I get cold even though we have central heat. I bought this smaller oscillating heater after my old one, which was taller, died. This one is about 18 inches tall but it totally puts out enough heat to heat the entire room so I am not cold anymore. Of course you can adjust the heat up or down and turn the oscillator on or off as suits your needs. The fan is super quiet too, even when oscillating. I would highly recommend this unit to anyone who needs a secondary heat source. It also has the safety tip-over feature so if it tilts or falls over, and the button on the bottom is no longer in contact with the floor or other hard surface it sits on, the heater automatically shuts off until it is put in the upright position again.

Name: Rosebud
Review: Didn’t want to spend a fortune on a Dyson fan so I hoped this fan would be a close enough version.  It has 3 speeds; the Low speed is quiet but useless because you can’t feel it so you have to have it on Medium or High. On High it’s pretty loud.  I hoped since it’s so tall that it would really put out some air but I get about the same amount out of my old oscillating fan. This fan is about 4ft tall and you get about a 12in area where there’s air coming out. There’s no way to adjust the height so if you don’t like where the air is blowing you’re out of luck. It doesn’t oscillate very far in either direction either.  The sleep function was weird in that the fan constantly turns itself off and on.  Didn’t like that either. Save your money and try a different fan. Update: After giving the fan to my husband to use he found another serious flaw; when he would adjust the tv volume with the remote control it also turns the fan off. Saw online others having the same problem. This fan is being returned back to Amazon.

Name: Michael R
Review: Echoing the headline above this product is exactly as described in the product description.  It is simple to operate and offer the settings and output that I desired for a small room needing an auxiliary heat source

Name: R. Carlson
Summary: Good heater, but Oscillation feature is wonky
Review: Like many of the other reviewers, I would rate this heater high on it's heating ability and it's quiet operation. It runs at about 55DB, about the noise you'd hear in a quiet library. The thermostatic feature is pretty good about holding to a specific temperature. The orange/black color scheme is a bit of a acquired taste, but I could have gotten used to it. There is a slight issue with the controls - there's just a large knob on the top and you select low heat, high heat or (I'm assuming) high heat with thermostatic control. You cannot select thermostatic control with low heat. Speaking of the thermostat, like most similar units, the thermostat is not calibrated to s particular temperature, you just pick a place on the dial and back it off or advance until you reach a comfortable temperature.The one problem I have with the unit is that the oscillation feature is not integrated to the thermostat. It's a switch on the lower back of the unit, hard to reach. This means that if you want to use oscillation with the thermostatic feature, when the unit is not blowing air, the heater continues to oscillate left to right.It's spooky. It makes a very slight sound . It's nodding it's head in disapproval.  It's judging you.....OK, maybe that last bit is not true, but the constant motion, even when it's not blowing air is simply annoying.The search for the perfect heater continues.....Pros:- Quiet- Powerful- Easy to use knob on the top- Provides a fan modeCons:- No ability to select thermostatic control and low power- Thermostat is not calibrated in degrees- Constant motion if oscillation is turned on, even when not blowingRecommendation: Good unit, but for this money it should provide better (and integrated) controls.

Name: david coffman
Summary: Good luck if you like to set a temperature instead of just on/off
Review: Update as I near the end of winter.  I reduced my review from 2 stars to 1 star.  This think is the most frustrating heater I've ever owned.  The inability to select a specific temperature, plus the units horrible ability to maintain a given temperature have made me decide to buy a new one later this year for next winter.  The unit is just soooo bad at keeping a specific temperature I can't stand it.  A thermometer I have says 68 degrees.  I tap the heater dial (don't change the dial position) and it heats to 77 degrees before I have to shut it off. I turn the dial to make it stop heating, then turn it right back to where it was (I put a mark on the top so I can align the dial to it) and it get to 68 or lower and doesn't turn on.  WTF.  I hate this thing.  Don't ever by it and don't buy anything from the maker.I bought this to replace a heater that I had for several years that was starting to have issues with the buttons.  Didn't want to risk anything with a product like this so bought this replacement.Pros:  Puts out heat very quickly  Very quietCons:  Variable temperature is poor at best - no numbers and not consistent  Oscillation switch location  Power light remains on unless unplugged  Oscillation rangeSo it is very quiet and I like that a lot.  It puts out heat quickly and warms my home office faster than my last (which also cost less and was smaller).I don't use a heater to blow warm air constantly, regardless of the room temperature.  I prefer to set a temperature that I'm comfortable with and let the unit come on/off as needed.  This has no temperatures on the variable control dial.  The product description says that, so can't say I wasn't warned.  I thought it would be easy to figure out where I like it and put a sticker on the dial so I know where to set it every day.  I got close, but every morning when I turn it to the mark, it heats above.  So I moved the mark to a lower temp (I moved it about 3/16 of an inch.  Then it heats to 2-3 degrees cooler than I want.  I just can't get it to heat to the temp I want.  So I wait until a thermometer in my office reads the desired temp and nudge it down to the lower mark.  When it comes back on as the room temp lowers, it heats way above where it was before.  Today, it heated to 7 degrees warmer and was still going when I realized it and turned it down further.  So not consistent at all.  It will require you to make adjustments during the day or settle for a cooler or warmer temp than you really wanted.As for the oscillation, it only covers about 30 degrees of range!  My old heater did more like 100-120 degrees.And the on/off, fan, temp controls are on the top, but the oscillation switch is all the way down at the bottom of the back.  Why?  What a silly design.  And when you turn it off at the top, it keeps oscillating unless you also turn off the oscillation switch.  Poor design in my opinion.  Why allow oscillation to continue when the fan is not blowing cool or warm air?I'll use it because I'm not going to spend more money on a heater that better fits my expectations, but I wanted to let potential buyers know about what I see as drawbacks.  If you just want to turn it on and have it keep heating regardless of room temperature, this is a good unit.  Otherwise, keep looking.  Wish I had.

Name: Angel
Review: I love the fan. It's very slender and not too bulky. I am a light sleeper, but I can sleep with this fan on at night with no issues. There is one thing I hate about this fan and that's the remote. It appears that my tv remote controls the fan as well. So if I turn the tv up, the fan started to swing. If I change the channels on my tv, the speed of the fan changes. This is extremely annoying.

Name: Ismael Vasquez
Review: This space heater is very nice because I use it to heat up my room whenever I go to sleep. Even using the heater for 20 minutes in a closed room and opening the door, I can feel the temperature difference right away going into the hall. It can be used as a regular fan as well but I think compared next to an actual fan that was made to blow air, it might fall a little behind but hey this is a space HEATER not a COOLER.My only gripe is that the Automatic Thermostat doesn't work as I had hope it did. I thought that it would heat up the area/room until it's internal Thermostat detects that a room is a certain temperature, stops, then turns back on  when it detects the below desired temperature. When I have this below the middle, it doesn't seem to stop and when i wake up, my room feels like the heater wants the room to be at 85f and there is no indicator anywhere about it. I also tested this out by having the heater stop by turning the thermostat  to a lower level, wait an hour and lower it even further and the heater doesn't turn on automatically. I guess it's meant to be either "do you want the room to be hot or the heater off?" modes.

Name: AmazonCustomer
Review: This heater worked ok until it STOPPED WORKING altogether about 2 months after I purchased it.Although the safety feature is useless - I had to practically turn the thing upside down in order to get it to “auto” shut-off, it did put out heat fairly well until it just decided to quit working at all.Given that it was too late to return the heater to Amazon by then, I had to deal with the manufacturer at that point.That’s when my REAL PROBLEMS began!I was given an 800 # that actually rings through to China, was finally able to get a 909 area code # for the company’s US HQ in CA, left numerous unreturned voicemails until I was finally able to get a “representative” there who answered the phone.Then the games began:Constant and useless email exchanges until I finally received a written “guarantee” for a full refund for a product that was allegedly out of stock when Amazon was still selling the same model.My guess is that the company that made the piece of junk didn’t want to send me a replacement piece of junk because the rep knew that he’d be hearing from me about it again.There are companies that will avoid dealing with their responsibilities in the hope that a good percentage of us will just give up and wind up being royally ripped off!The “promise” of a refund with due by date was not kept, so I finally called Amazon because I was no longer willing to be BS’d by the manufacturer.Fortunately, a very nice Amazon supervisor stepped in and issued a refund from Amazon, given that I’m a good customer and have a Prime membership.If you buy this heater you might get “lucky” and have it still working past the 90 warranty period.Otherwise, you’ll have to fight like hell to get help.Regardless of the the discounted price - I have to wonder if the price came down while it was still way cold in many parts of the US and Canada because there were many people who had problems with this heater.......at this time of the year when most of us wont be needing much heat until the Fall chill returns in October or November, I WOULDN’T take a chance with this one while it sits in your basement, garage or closet turned OFF until you try to use it again long after your 90 warranty has expired.BEWARE of this company called “TrueTech”True? Seriously?!

Name: Andres P. Nevarez
Review: A great fan quiet and very stylish

Name: DBW
Review: This space heater is quiet, puts out plenty of heat and is light weight. It has a tip over safety switch that shuts the unit off if tipped over. However, it does have its faults:- The oscillating switch is on the bottom of the back of the unit, cumbersome to get to. In addition, with the switch turned on, the unit oscillates whether or not the fan or heater is turned on. Kind of useless to have a space heater/fan oscillating with no heat or fan. I have since re-wired mine so it only oscillates if the fan or heater is turned on.- The carry handle is near worthless for me, I can only get the very tips of my fingers in it due to it being so shallow. As a result, when I try to pick it up with the carry handle it tilts away from my hand and slips off my fingers. I have to use two hands to pick it up, one to put my fingers in the handle and the other to prevent the unit from tipping over.As a result of these two issues I can only give three stars for a review.

Name: Amazon Customer
Summary: Great lightweight heater,with plenty of heat.
Review: When I first saw it, I was disappointed. It was not as tall as I expected. But when I plugged it in, I was no longer disappointed.  Good heat and a good blower.

Name: Yifan Wang
Review: Conclusion: A good looking, space-saving product but with major design flaw and messy wiring.As you can see from the video, the heater won’t turn on unless I press it down, due to the failure design- tip over protection. It works well on flat surface, but on carpet, due to its lightweight, the body of heater won’t give enough pressure to activate switch under the base. Also, for a product of 70 dollars, I really didn’t expect such messy wiring inside the body. You can directly see the motor, and wires crossing each other, making me question its quality.For the heating part, it is acceptable. It also has cooling fan function, which seems to be redundant. What customers need is heating and company should focus on doing this well instead of adding unnecessary features and ignoring quality control.

Name: Linda Applegate
Review: I pretty like this heater, far away better than the old one I got from the dollar general last year. Those two heaters are not a big difference between Price, but at the quality, this portable heater is quieter than the older one. Also, I like the free choice of heating level design. It is perfectly excellent. Before I make this purchase, I have stopped by a couple of local stores. They're not too many options and product detail. by the way, I really appreciate Amazon. It gave me more choices and provide better products for me.

Name: Ryan
Review: I love the oscillation, and the heat output is decent. The thermostat is nice too. Also quiet and at a decent price.BUT, it loses 2 stars because it can not be used on any surface that is not EXACTLY level. We are in an older house with some rooms that don't have a perfectly level floor, or sometimes even the floor material itself is not flat. The safety feature it has whereas it will shutoff if tipped over is great, but it's VERY sensitive. Anything past a degree of tilt it shuts off. We ended up having to use coaster(s) and miscellaneous thin objects to lift one side of the heater a quarter inch to a half inch just to get it to turn on; and even then it sometimes shutoff randomly.

Name: Raymond Jann
Review: The fan is quiet, controls are easy to use except I wish they were located higher on the fan.  I would purchase again and recommend

Name: Mums
Summary: Excellent Space Heater for a Small Space or a Cold Corner
Review: This heater works very well to provide heat in small spaces or in cold corners, which is where I have mine.  There is a safety feature which is a button on the bottom so that the hear automatically turns off if it should happen to tip over. There is also an oscillating switch if you need or want it.Just one thing, though.  The button didn't work on my carpet, so I got a tempered glass cutting board (This one: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003I24FJY/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o01_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1) to place underneath it and now it works very well.

Name: Kimberly
Review: Out the box It didn't work when I first plugged up but decided to wait and try again later that day and it worked but close to an hour later it was off and wouldn't come on until next day and it lasted thoughout the day and night no problem until next day it shut off and wouldn't come on.. it only works when it wants to. Already trashed the box so return isn't an option. The heater heats up good and warms up the room when it actually does decide to work.

Name: Lori Gulley
Review: Living in Southern Florida and walking a dog 3-4 times a day, this fan is awesome!  Coming in and being able to sit down and cool off quickly is a blessing!  This fan is quiet and efficient.  I highly recommend it to any woman who is suffering from hot flashes! It's like having your own personal air conditioner.

Name: Theresa A Gregg
Review: Have Heat up to high, doesn't work very good have to be 1 ft distance to feel any heat. My bedroom is still freezing. I have given it a hour to Heat my bedroom area, no good. I'm going bad to my old Heater, it gets more area warm. I'm very disappointed with this tower Heater. The top knob not sure which one is High Temperature. A little heat comes out a small opening about 8 inches so it's not a true tower Heater. I'm very disappointed! This is a waste of money!

Name: DOC
Review: For the money, this little heater gets the job done.. Since our gym went into lockdown, we decided to turn our garage into a gym.. As it turns out, its pretty chilly out there in the morning and this little heater totally takes the edge off. It is in a 10' x 20' single car garage and has no problem getting the temp up to about 70 degrees (F).. For perspective, it lives in the Pacific Northwest with an insulated garage and does very well.. Not sure how well it would work in colder climates, but out here it does just fine..

Name: MM
Review: The space heater works well, lots of heat. Two small things disappointed us.First the anti-tipping switch on the bottom is not disengaged when standing on our carper, we had to put a book underneath the heater so it would turn on. Second the oscillating feature operates on its own switch independent of the heating switch, so even when the heater is turned off you have to turn the oscillating switch of as well.The unit looks nice and works well with those two exceptions.

Name: BBQ'r
Review: Very quite compared to the small cube type. Being tall it warms my sitting area more evenly vs the shorter type. It has a thermostat type function where you turn the knob to a certain point. Once it hits that temperature in the room it is supposed to cycle off then back on. I find it useless because it is a guess as to what temperature you are setting, more trial and error. It also has a switch on the back bottom to allow it to oscillate back and forth. This works independent of the on-off temperature switch so you must turn both off when done otherwise it will swing back and forth until you do. Found this out the hard way.It is more expensive then others but I did like it enough to buy two more for other office staff. One of those came in with a dead fan, turned it on and almost immediately smelt the plastic burning. That one needs to go back.

Name: Mansur
Summary: I don't recommend this heater... Better off choosing a different one!
Review: I was looking for a decent heater that would heat my home office and unfortunately this model is not powerful enough... I don't feel the heat unless I am sitting very close to it and even then it does not offer very many settings.. Also be wary that the oscillating function is completely separate switch that you have to remember to turn off! How inconvenient, save yourself the time and choose a different model  :-/

Name: Gordon Kindlmann
Summary: Will oscillate even when not heating!
Review: I have never seen an oscillating space heater like this: there is a switch to turn on/off the back-and-forth oscillating motion, but this is completely unrelated to whether the heater is heating.  After it has warmed an area, it will just sit there, whirring away as it waves back and forth, but not heating.  It is kind of cute but mostly pathetic and also noisier than it needs to be.  Also, the hysteresis loop for the heating is must be much wider than other space heaters I've used; it feels like maybe 10 or 15 degrees F: it will get really cold before it starts heating again, and will get really hot before it decides to turn off.  Would not recommend.

Name: Lavada Smith
Summary: Quiet running, easy to see controls
Review: This is a nice heater. Small, blends into any decor. It runs quiet, throws its heat, and best of all for me, the controls are very large, on the top of the machine, and very easy to see and use. Turn the power on in the back, select the heat setting and you are done. Who ever designed the heater and wrote the instructions did a very good job. I am older and the light weight is nice for me to lift. All in All, a very nice product.

Name: Arielle Mangabat
Review: First of all, I’m surprised by the range of this little guy. Usually when I have heat lamps, they stay really hot in one spot... and then the rest of the room is freezing.Our apartment is really cold, and we don’t have a heater that works. This heater is great for our bedroom, and it’s light weight enough so I can carry it with me to different parts of the apartment easily. It looks very sleek too.Another important factor is that it will immediately shut off if it falls over. I have cats so... yeah.Overall, I’m happy with what I spent on it. Seems solid but don’t expect it to heat up an entire house!

Name: iankur
Review: The thing is a piece of garbage. The safety switch  at the bottom is too hard so it doesn’t work on carpeted rooms. The temperature control is terrible- the room varies in temperature by up to 6-7deg Fahrenheit. Even the temperature at which the heater turns on is inconsistent (with the control knob in the same place). Only thing going for it is it’s quiet.

Name: BluBird
Review: Purchased the Space Heater for Office - 1500W Electric Ceramic Heater Fan Tower January 25 and timely delivery January 27. Have been using every day since, no issues with the lengthy time I have it powered on. I love the color combination Orange and Black it definitely is UNIQUE. It rotates, shuts off when tilted as stated and heats up the room in under a minute. Pleased with my purchase and would highly recommend.

Name: Connie
Review: This fan is aesthetically pleasing, quiet, slim, and works great. It only makes noise when the oscillation is on and circulates air through my master bedroom nicely. Not the most powerful fan I’ve had but I’m very happy with this purchase.

Name: Aniloly Jimenez
Review: Very good fan. Blows air and cools down my bedroom

Name: Alexis Moore
Review: Love this. I’m very hot natured but everyone else in the house gets cold so it’s perfect for me and cools off a big space very quickly.

Name: Maria
Summary: Merchandised was totally damaged in many pieces n was scratched like it was not new
Review: Merchandise was cracked and damaged and it looked used had scratches and came in more pieces then it suppose to it was a disaster but it was no problem to return and didn’t take to long to get reimbursed didn’t try to prefer another very bad experience and was soo disappointed when I received the fan

Name: J. Hoyle
Summary: Effective little heater - but beware how hot the casing gets!
Review: Effective heater.  I like that it has a safety turn-off in case the tower is knocked over. However, when I grabbed the heater to move it after it had been running for a bit, the casing was incredibly hot to the touch!  I would buy it again, even knowing this, but it would be useful that there was a warning sticker on the tower itself.

Name: Ginger I. Smith
Review: I received this heater a few day ago and it has lived up to all expectations. I read reviews and researched lots of heaters before deciding on this one. It is quiet, puts out lots of heat, it actually is more than I expected. It is a small powerful unit. As stated if you have shag carpeting you have to put something flat for it to set on so the tip over function works well. You will not go wrong with this heater.

Name: Mari T. Zarpour
Summary: DO NOT BUY-Broke after only a few times of use!
Review: I purchased this product for my elderly father who is always complaining about how cold he is. He only used it a few times before he left my house. He had indicated that it wasn't working right but I thought it was just him. I went to use it again just a bit ago now that the weather has turned colder, and now it doesn't turn on at all. I guess it's too late for a refund. This is a cheaply made product.

Name: Becky C
Review: I’ve had a couple different space heaters before and this is by far the best one so far at its price point. I appreciate the oscillation and it keeps the basement during the middle of winter nice and warm. The different heat settings are nice as well if you want less heat too.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Honestly, not the best heater I’ve used. The reason being that when I turn on the swivel, it makes this god awful grinding noise every time it changes direction which is extremely annoying to listen to. Does it put out heat? Yes. I’m going to get one with a remote next time that doesn’t make an annoying noise when I’m trying to sleep or just be alive in general with this thing on.

Name: me
Review: Noisy!  So noisy. If not for the noise, it would be a great small heater.  The heat seems to work fine so I give it credit for that, but the noise it makes is so darn annoying. I would say it isn’t good for use anywhere but the bathroom because of that.

Name: Patrick Henry
Review: Love this fan! I can hear an ant walk across the room and be woken up. This is super quiet and just the right amount of airflow to keep me comfortable at night. Highly recommend it to fellow light sleepers who also need air circulation.

Name: Jacster
Review: I wrote a complaint, was told I would be contacted and my money refunded and nothing happened. Amazon dropped the ball.  It was very warm and worked fine, for the 2 months that it worked. Then nothing...just stopped working. For the price, it should have lasted a few seasons. VERY disappointed in Amazon too.

Name: jenny
Review: I received my heater which will heat a room in my garage that I have turned into my pottery studio.  When I turned it on, I was unsure if it would heat the whole room. Today I went out to see how it was doing and was amazed at how warm the room was. I had to turn the temp down. Temperature here during the night was 28 degrees.  Unit is light and easy to use. Will have to wait to see how much it adds on to my electric bill. Great product.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: The heat output on this heater is amazing! For such a small mechanism, it delivers a vast amount of heat in a short time. I’ve purchased two other types of heaters prior to this one that are larger and claim to be efficient for larger spaces but they don’t compare to this one by far.

Name: Ed
Review: This heater packs a punch. I wish it had a remote control. The safety switch at the bottom could be designed better, because it does not work well on carpet. Other than that I recommend this heater to heat up the small area. Will see how this heater performs the next few months and Into next year.

Name: MJ3543
Review: Used this for the last month and I would have to say I am not impressed for the cost that was paid. The heat out put is warm, but the fan limits how far the heat can travel. Its basically a radiant heater. The plug also gets very warm if its used for a few hours.

Name: Justin A Bame
Review: I should of believed the reviews. Fan has tape on the back to seal a split in the case fresh out of the box. High is incredibly disappointing. Sure it’s not a top price fan but for the money not worth it. Best part of the fan is the annoying blue lights shut off. But the most annoying thing is the fan changes speed when I turn the tv up! Pay more and buy a different fan!

Name: Love
Review: My room and my master bathroom is really big it’s a good size room and this heater heats up my room and my master bathroom in about 10 minutes I’m anemic and I’m always cold and my children are always hot so I bought this thinking I’d give it a try I really didn’t think it was going to work as great as it does if you’re thinking about getting one it’s well worth the money

Name: ThrifterGifter
Review: It's a nice slim designed fan that doesn't take up lots of space, but for the price vs. the quality....I DO NOT recommend buying when you could get a cheaper fan, that's nicer for the price!

Name: Lena L.
Summary: Confusing features but keeps a small bathroom quite warm
Review: Temperature control is a bit confusing and it's a knob at the top. The overal appliance is an energy vampire and causes short circuits so this is one of the devices you gotta not run with too many  devices all at once.

Name: Carrie Carlson
Summary: Not liking how it turns off and on and the high heat
Review: I had trouble getting it on at first but then I gave it a gentle shake. I do have carpet so that might have been the reason. My other complaint is if you move it over a little I have to turn it back on. I am also having trouble with it running at the higher temperature but if you want a lot of warmth you will like this heater.

Name: J. Stone
Review: I wish this space heater got hotter. I don't understand entirely what the pictures on it represent but it works. The safety feature of it turning off when you pick it up is likely very valuable if it keeps working. Overall it works fine, but I just wish it were hotter.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: I am irate. The whole point of paying for a refurbished item is to save money. Instead I wasted my time on a defective product when I could’ve just paid full price for an item that does work!!!!!

Name: S. Fisher
Review: I bought this to keep my greenhouse warm. I really like the safety feature that shuts it off if it leans or tips. The oscillating feature is great too. Nice steady heat and low energy use.

Name: Dgallo
Summary: Good flow of heat from a small heater.
Review: I bought this heater to accommodate my 96 year old mother in law. Our family room is a few degrees cooler in the winter than the rest of the house. This heater heats the room which is approx. 12' x 26' very well. It's more powerful than I expected. My mother in law loves it. The only issue I have with this heater is that you do not know what the temperature is when controlling the dial to give more or less heating time.  I like that it does shut off periodically when it reaches a certain temperature.

Name: smokyhillcandles
Review: Cannot be used on a normal 15 amp household plug.  I plugged into 20 amp kitchen plug and it worked good but that doesn't help with my home office.  Had to return it.

Name: Kerstin B.
Review: Love this heater!!I do newborn photo sessions at my house in my living room, which I converted into a studio. The problem is that it has very high ceilings, so that room hardly ever gets warm. Obviously with newborns I need the studio to be warm, so that's where this little heater does an amazing job. It does exactly what I need it to do. I also love that it's pretty small. My old one was kinda bulky and took up a lot more room. Definitely a great buy!

Name: Conner McPhee
Summary: Efficient Little Heater, gets the job done
Review: This product was actually much better than my expectations, this little heater stands no taller than a desktop PC and is able to warm a pretty good size area. recently I bought it to heat up a roommates room in the winter, as our heating system in our house doesn't work well.From what I have felt and heard it was beyond expectations, the oscillating feature is really nice for big areas as well.Probably looking to get another one for my bedroom as well.

Name: Catechist
Review: It didn't even make it a month. Im returning this feeling very disappointed. If you pay $75 for a heater your expecting a heater thats good at heating and last more then a month. Wouldn't recommend to anyone.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Bought two of these. First one stopped working in 3 months. Second one began melting itself and stopped working in six months. Do not buy

Name: LilysLovelyLashes
Review: I like this heater but I would have liked it to have a timer. The heater does give you shocks when you plug it out as well in which it’s scary

Name: Jennifer J Price
Review: I like this heater, I thought it would taller but it’s my fault for not looking at the measurements of the heater. Also it has to be on a solid surface to work, I tried placing it on my carpet and I thought it wasn’t working but as soon as I placed it on the wood it worked. So now I just placed a book under it so I can have it in my bedroom. Overall works fine and is not very loud, sounds like white noise in the background.

Name: Rapavt
Summary: Doesn’t keep our cold dining room warm enough
Review: I was hoping this little heater would have a bigger heat punch. It puts out heat but not enough for my cold dining room.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Absolutely loved this heater. Doesn’t take up much space. No sound and it really works. I bought it for my parents. They have a small studio with no heater. Their studio was very cold in the winter and they needed to layer up. Now with this heater, their studio is nice and warm...no need to layer up anymore. It heats up very well. I highly recommend it.

Name: Shannon
Review: This small streamlined heater is a great value.  We purchased this for a large reception area in an office space and the heat output is perfect.  For the price, this is a real deal.  I like that the size does not make it an eyesore.

Name: CRS
Review: This product when received just didn’t work properly for me. I had to return the item and ask for a refund. Your outcome may be different but I decided to go with another heater.

Name: Christopher Zeilman
Summary: nice and hot for a cold room
Review: My grandmother loved this heater it made her feel warm even though we keep the thermostat way down in combination with a magnetic plate on the vent she was nice an toasty

Name: scootz
Review: good source of heat.a personal note and oversight on my part.  i had looked at so many and really wanted one with a remote.  this one doesn't have one.  took for granted it did.  however as for performance, it is a good unit.

Name: Leoan
Review: A very good heating machine, only after a while, the temperature of the whole room will rise. There are three temperature adjustments for large, medium and small. It does not take up space in the corner of the room. It is small in size but fast in heating. I really like this heating.  machine,

Name: Andromeda
Review: I purchased 1500W Electric Ceramic Heater Fan Tower Oscillating Portable Heater, Package was great, Nice Looking, easy on off setting, easy Temp selection, Oscillating very smoothly, Extremely quite, I love it.  Regards.

Name: Parbhat Kapoor
Review: This is a great quality product. It certainly keeps our 400SQ Ft room warm! Can be moved easily. Very easy to operate.High 5 for this product!

Name: melissa
Summary: No blades to dust off and unique style
Review: Unique and quiet but on high speed the air flow is steady and intermittently blows harder??  Also strangely, the tv remote turns it on??

Name: mary dunn
Review: Worked for a few hours and quit.  Tried different sockets etc.  never worked again

Name: Mr and Mrs Tran
Review: Its not as warm as I wanted. I like the feature of not working if falling over but at the same time don’t like if because it won’t work on carpet.

Name: G
Review: Good value for the price. Safety feature kicks in any time the heater is touched which is a plus. Would buy this item again.

Name: Josue
Review: This little heater packs a fire punch.Heats up within seconds.Ive read all the reviews on how quiet it is, but in my opinion it's rather loud ay least if you're trying fall asleep and it's on. I think a timer would have been a great feature to this heater aswell.

Name: Myrna Gillespie
Review: The heater is very small and although it says it has a thermostat there is no way to set the temp. It is very lightweight and feels very cheap. Maybe a $20  value, definitely NOT $70. I want to return the heater.

Name: Suz Ryan
Review: We bought this for a larger space in our basement because the heat has trouble getting down there and it works great! It warms the entire living room area and is also super easy to move from room to room. I love that is oscillates and has a variety of settings not just on or off.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Purchased in January 2020; Quit working 10/20/2020

Name: Heather Phillips
Summary: Great fan - keeps the air moving
Review: I purchased this fan for the attic portion of our house that does not get great air circulation in the summer.  It has really helped in my office space.  I am able to work from home more comfortably and the fan is quiet enough that I don't need to turn it off during important conference calls.  It is sleek and stylish as well.  I have really enjoyed this purchase.

Name: Catherine Gruber
Review: Heats well. The temperature control knob is a little hard to handle. It does oscillate which is nice and is well constructed.

Name: Leah Mccabe
Review: This didn't do very well in our insulated porch but we love our smaller heaters just fine so we will stick with those.

Name: mary dunn
Review: This light weight, compact, easy to use space heater is just what I wanted!  Only drawback is the carrying handle is not really deep enough to allow for easy pick up and carrying.

Name: Andy J. Harrelson
Review: It was smaller than I thought it was going to be. It does put out great heat and is lightweight. I just wish it was a little taller to better heat a person standing because it only comes up to around knees and I was wanting one maybe to come up to around hips. But its not a bad heater for the price.

Name: summoh
Review: Didn’t assemble properly. Upper half and lower half didn’t line up. Low quality plastic construction.

Name: C. KC
Review: It’s very lightweight, smaller and not as ‘substantial’ as expected for the price...however, it certainly kicks out the heat and is warming up our very cold office.  My husband said it’s perfect.

Name: Chris Scott
Review: First impression is that it's a simple compact heater that looks pretty nice astatically. Simple controls and the heat output for my situation is outstanding, I'm using it in an office setting almost directly behind me about 3 feet and can easily feel the heat coming in to my space. Auto thermostat seems like it works well initially time will tell.Overall I am liking it for what I need. We'll see about working longevity I suppose.

Name: Doug C. 718
Summary: Stopped working no replies to emails
Review: Stopped working after a few days, sent several emails  no reply, very dissatisfied.

Name: Ty Steele
Review: Puts out good heatVery quietThe thermostat auto temp detection doesn’t work at all.

Name: Christine E. Scott
Review: Very quiet. For a second I didn't think it was working. Lots of heat! Good feature controls

Name: Julia
Summary: This works extremely well and is safe to use.
Review: This is a great heater.  It looks good, it’s safe, and it REALLY heats.

Name: Marlene Arcolesse
Review: Works great moving the air aroundQuiet operation

Name: Hunterview
Review: We bought this little heater to help keep our bedroom warm while our baby is sleeping in there with us. It works great and I love that it doesn’t take up much space!

Name: secbnc
Summary: Small size with a big punch
Review: Great little heater that produces tons of heat. Quiet.Only improvement that could be made is wish it osillated more than 45 degrees.Highly recommend!

Name: Siu-Mui Ng
Summary: Keep User Manual About the Heater
Review: I like that it provides fast heat quickly once turn on to high heat. I also like that I can select the amount of heat I want and the oscillating function is a plus. However, I don't like the carry handle. It's not deep in enough; it is a little difficult to get a good grip. I like the newer model's carry handle. Overall, I like this heater except the carry handle.

Name: Byron Grace
Review: I like that it light and easy to move around. My office gets quite cold in low tempertures so with the trustech ptc heater it warms my whole office which is about 15x20. I like that i can ajust the heater with one control and let it do its job.

Name: Michelle
Review: It did not shut on and off with the thermostat like I thought it would

Name: lynda
Summary: Not worth the money and very un stable
Review: Tried putting this fan together and did not even get past the connecting to the  base it just would not snap togeIther and of course its plastic so I was afraid it would snap if I forced it. Even the bottom part that was on the chasis was very unstable.  Surely this item was not worth  the money $100.00

Name: Charles Shepard
Review: This heater is adequate for a very small room. Maybe a small bathroom

Name: Jasmine Q
Review: I bought 2 of these for my kitchen and dining area. I have tile floors and it is cold in the winter time. I plugged them both in on opposites sides and just about made a sauna! HAHA!! I only use one now. These heaters pack a punch! Super happy with my purchase. :)

Name: Orchid Goddess
Review: Excellent and powerful for a small unit. Not too hot just right.

Name: Jessie Ratulowski
Review: This heater is a life saver! We don't have a very well insulated master bedroom and run it constantly to keep it at decent temp. Its never overheated, its super light weight, multiple levels of heat, fall over protection works great! We have pets and kids that knock it over daily. Overall great product.

Name: jenny smith
Review: Nice quiet heater just wish it would put out a little more heat.

Name: michael l. fitzhenry
Review: The heater works excellent ,and it will heated room within 10 minutes ,the problem is if you use it too many times don’t expect your electricity bill to be low.

Name: James E. Davison
Review: Have to rectify the problem with a nonworking on off pilot light

Name: FCT
Review: We have an office at our business that never seems to be as warm as our customer lobby.  This heater did the trick!  It heats the space very quickly.  It is an excellent value and was just what we needed...in a nice compact design that was just the right size!

Name: Erick Hall
Review: It works perfectly, is ideally sized and easy to place in any room and space.

Name: Kellz
Review: Very unhappy with this product, the description and the quality was not as described. Not satisfied at all with this product

Name: Ajax
Summary: Great for heating a small space
Review: The ocsillating movement really makes this a good device.

Name: Christina E. Daltro
Review: It was exactly what I expected. Arrived on time and working good. Thank you!I'd like to receive the Zippo Hand Warmer as the gift offered.

Name: Jessica L.
Review: Works great!!! Perfect for small/medium areas. Sensitive to tipping and turns off immediately! The outside doesn’t get too hot. Worth the $60.

Name: David R.
Review: Just got the little guy and it works at heating up the bedroom faster than my portable radiator and without the stink.  The noise from the oscillation is mellow and sleep inducing, so that's not an issue.  The tip over protection works, it stopped when I jostled it accidentally then started right up again when straightened.  It does the job as advertised.

Name: sandra minckler
Review: did not heat as expected........bought for extra heat in my workshop,

Name: Jacque T.
Review: Exceeded my expectations, heats up my sons bedroom within minutes. Auto off if lifted up or toppled over

Name: Big Jimmy
Summary: Great portable heater for a room.
Review: More compact than illustrated which is good. Quiet operation

Name: Samuel
Summary: Can't use it. Keeps blowing fuse.
Review: Don't know if it's good or not. Can't keep it on longer than a couple minutes without the power going out in half my house. I tried various plugs around the house, and same situation. Don't know why one thing would do that, but it's unusable.

Name: Real review
Review: Less than 30 days and fan went out.  Luckily, there is a return beyond 30 days on this item.  Go with a name brand instead.

Name: lisa ulissi
Review: This space heater was not cheap and it stopped working after using it a limited number of times. It was functional for less then 2 1/2 months and I only ran it approx. 10 minutes a day. What a rip off!!!

Name: Hermit Kona
Review: I need thermostat to control temperature. Looked at other reviews, found this is a pretty common problem. So returned.

Name: john hornsby
Review: Product works well good heat

Name: Harrison
Review: Product was a little smaller than I expected however it works fantastic! Heats up near instantaneously and keeps my whole bedroom warm. It is also very quiet for its efficiency, Would definitely recommend!

Name: Lily
Summary: Uses too much power for my apartment. Breakers flip.
Review: The breakers flip when I use it. So can no longer use it.

Name: Mohammed Ahmed
Summary: This is very light weight and easy to move around
Review: This is very light weight and easy to move around. I like it the way it work. Even a small touch stop the heater which shows how safety it is for kids. Especially my kid keep trying to touch that and thats stops which is really helpful otherwise it will be a mess.  Thanks

Name: Kathryn Hennessy
Review: This product is working fine in a drafty space in my bedroom. An added plus is it's quiet.

Name: Rosie
Review: Looking for cooling fan. Was returned.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: I really like it a lot

Name: Han
Review: The first thing that I noticed after turning it on is how quiet it is, I even went to double-check that it is on. It heats up our living room fairly quick, considering its small size. At this price point, it's totally worth the price!

Name: docsizzle
Review: Air is not cold or cool. Weak air breeze strength. Not quiet when in quiet mode, imo.

Name: Trail Cam User
Review: We recently purchased a Space Heater for Office - Electric Ceramic Portable Oscillating Space Tower Heater Fan w/Thermostat.  We have used it a few times and my wife loves it.  We plan on using it on our deck this Fall and then once the winter turns too cold, we'll set it in our spare bedroom for our guests to use.  Thanks....Great product.

Name: K. Trupp
Review: Puts out an amazing amount of heat for its  compact size.  Perfect for my guestroom where it's the only source of heat.

Name: Fred
Review: Did not work.  From the packing, it had obviously been returned before.  The worst part — this was sent as a gift.

Name: Michael
Review: It has some settings on the dial that are confusing and you also have to turn the oscillating feature on/off separately from the heat settings. Other than that great heater with good output for the size.

Name: Eric
Review: Disperses heat very nicely! I really like the thermostat feature (other space heaters pump out heat until they melt their own plastic).  I have it next to my desk in my drafty poorly insulated back room and it makes my gaming time nice and cozy!

Name: sharee m.
Review: Very small and does not heat my large living room. It's also very short.

Name: Jason
Review: in the past, I have bought many space heaters. it not only broke after using continuously but it also used all my powers and had a constant blackout. However, this heater has various settings that allowed me to conserve energy yet heated my room pretty well with the low setting. I recommend anyone who wants to heat up their room quickly and conserve energy!

Name: Kristen
Review: Died after a year. Bought Dec 2019. Put away for the warm weather, then brought out again last October. January 12 it just stopped working. The rotation part still works but the heat function is just dead.

Name: Chestout Corey
Review: Great office heater. I placed It in the corner of my office and everyone feels it when they walk in.  I like it. I wish I would have gotten one that was a little taller. This one does a great job of providing heat to my legs and feet. But in the future I will get one with the same power but taller.

Name: Julius Annan
Summary: worked for 5 months and then broke. not worth it
Review: the Product worked for "one year" and suddenly stopped working.It was used for 3 months last winter and then 2 months so far this winter.would not recommend this to anyone

Name: J Braby 2020
Summary: Amazing heat for a small profile heater
Review: When the heater arrived it was smaller than I thought it might be, but it certainly does the job.  It heats up within seconds, and the three different heating options are a plus.  Overall recommended and very worth the price.

Name: xiaojin Huang
Summary: Broken after a month and half use
Review: The heater is broken right after the return period. Don’t buy it.

Name: Chris
Review: Centralized heating, one person uses power saving 2, compared with oil Ting, European heater, this can be put under the desk, so that the lower limbs will be very warm, can not wear cotton towing 3, good-looking, the switch is convenient at the top,

Name: fred
Review: Very safe and well built unit. Kinda of a strange design, but it works. Good air flow. Recommend.

Name: Evelyn
Review: Did not last a month, heat works but the fan died so it just ends up burning the element.

Name: Christy Perando
Review: This is an awesome heater.  It pumps out a lot of heat for the size of the unit and has great safety features.  We use space heaters in the winter as it gets very cold here and we don't want to pay a $600 electrical bill.  This unit warms whatever room it's in very quickly.  Will be getting another!

Name: Brittany LaPour
Review: Ever since buying mine it started making noise when it turns which is kind of annoying but I’m good at blocking it out. Other than that great item.

Name: Guitars rcool
Review: It doesn't put out much heat. Smaller than what is shown in the picture.

Name: Luis
Review: I bought this to warm up my legs while working at my desk, and it does it wonderfully. You can feel the heat instantly, and it is very quiet.It would be nicer if it had a remote control or at least a timer so I don't have to get up once it is getting too hot, but overall the product does its job, and it does it well.

Name: Cisek
Review: Great heater for the money. Definitely heats up a decent sized room. Would recommend for anyone that’s looking for a small heater for a bedroom or office.

Name: Jacob
Review: Works good but DO NOT BUY if you have kids around as the front great will burn them.

Name: Holly G. Davis
Review: No easy way to pick it up and move it with one hand. Top heavy. Big disappointment

Name: alex deherrera
Review: This heater works very well & has low noise. Heats up the basement  for being a small device. Instructions are very simple. Only downside of it would be that the dial does not turn on the heater until it is half way up the thermostat. It also trips the fuse when there are too many outlets being used in the same room. Otherwise it's a great heater.

Name: Gray Sky
Summary: But this one instead of the other.
Review: Awesome item, it heats up really quickly, probably the best one in the same category

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Perfect for my bedroom so I do not need to heat the entire house. Keeps us warm in a large master. Sometimes, it can get too hot. It does seem to stay on when plugged in. However most fans and similars do the same. Probably a way to adjust with the settings or by reading the manual.

Name: Kevin
Review: The heater is lightweight and easily transportable. The safety shutoff works best on solid surfaces and is an added benefit to those concerned about tipping or the unit falling and igniting. The unit quickly heats up a medium sized room, but should not be used to heat anything mush larger. The unit is quiet and has a sleek build. No complaints.

Name: Sandra J. Flinchum
Review: I love how quiet the fan really is. no need to turn up the television because you got a fan running on high with this fan. Super super quiet A++

Name: MARTY
Review: This heater is very quiet. And it has a low enough voltage that I was able to plug it into my extension cord under my desk without tripping a breaker

Name: Healthy Running Mom
Review: I've ordered 2 different space heaters trying to find the right one & this is it!  it is easy  & heats up quickly.  It's also very sensitive & has an auto shut off if it tips.  so, there's no reason to worry about danger.

Name: Ludy Moreno
Summary: Exactly what I was looking for at a great price so I got two
Review: I have one in my cold basement and one in my office. I like that when bumped it shuts itself off. I would recommend.

Name: Nick C.
Review: This heater is really quiet, and has auto shutoff when it gets to a certain temperature that you can. It has also a cooling fan that works perfectly. It is also safe and portable. I am happy with this purchase

Name: Debbie Digiovanna
Review: Love size  Heat output @ safety features

Name: Linda
Review: Portable and easy to use with its safety tip over feature. Heats a 11 x 12 rom very well.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: My office is always chilly in the morning and this heater is perfect for warming it up fast.

Name: Elmer E. Bost
Review: Exactly what I needed.

Name: George Zuefle
Review: It is a nice little personal heater.  It does not heat the room, although the room is small.  But it heats me very well while I use my computer

Name: Kt Hill
Review: This heater is great for my daughter’s room that is always cold in the winter. The amount of heat it puts out is impressive for its small, lightweight size. I don’t worry about it falling over and starting a fire either as it automatically quits when tipped over. Great product for a great cost!

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: plug in an go good an warm

Name: ariel wilson
Review: Just started using this heater and its all ready far better than the one I have been using from target. It warmed my room up quickly, and although it's not silent, its really quiet. Really happy with the purchase!

Name: Jose Ramirez
Review: I used this heater outdoors and kept me very warm in the cold

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: It is just as advertised, it adequately heats a medium room very well, very pleased with this purchase!

Name: Susan Y.
Review: Bathroom

Name: Micro Pickson
Review: It is easy to switch between different modes. It offers a fan, and two different temperature for warming. It works well and can provide heat for a small bedroom. I will update this comment after it has been working for a while.

Name: Vance Booker
Review: When this heater came I was disappointed in the heating opening, however, it delivers as muchor more than the other quartz heater we have used. The oscillation is a positive feature.

Name: Abby A
Review: Does what it says.Going to order 2 morePerfect for shop bathroom

Name: Julie
Review: Very good product. It's quiet and heats up really quickly!

Name: Erica Holm
Review: Didn’t put out that much heat really. Was disappointed

Name: Anna
Review: Warms up the space around it very quickly and doesn’t take a lot of space. I haven’t heard any plastic smell yet, which is extremely important. Good product!

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: We bought this little guy to heat a newly renovated basement room. I was curious to see how well it would work since it was so small but it heated the room up in a matter of minutes. It small form factor is great. It’s heat out put is amazing and the adjustable thermostat work fantastic.

Name: BRANDON
Summary: Looks good in any modern room
Review: Great fan

Name: Ltcbpla
Summary: Exactly what I was looking for !! Love it !!
Review: This heater is the perfect size for what I need. It gives off good heat & being able to control the temp is great. I love the oscillating factor. Not too much, just enough. I am very satisfied & would recommend it.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Hard to find perfect temp setting. Safety feature super sensitive.

Name: Gabi
Review: I was very skeptic when the heater arrived due to it's light weight as I was used to ceramic heaters. It turns out to be perfect for my 12x12 unheated back porch. Simple dial turn, gives heat immediately with quiet fan blower and turns off when comfort level has reached. It's perfect!

Name: Ray Rami
Summary: Heats Quickly and safe around kids!
Review: I actually really like this product, it shuts off when tipped or picked. And it's heated a  very large storage area in 30 minutes. Great product!

Name: Mike miller
Review: I really like the different noise level modes especially the sleep mode. It fits in almost any space and works great.

Name: havva
Review: It is a great heater for the price. Most important thing is the auto thermostat. It is just turn on and off depends on the settings. The only negative thing is that it does not work on carpet.

Name: Kevin
Review: Not very quiet in medium and high speeds.

Name: Kyle Kindy
Review: It is quiet…because it doesn’t blow enough air to cool a room…unless that room is a closet.

Name: Daphne Scott
Review: PERFECT FOR THE OFFICE

Name: Aimee
Review: It heats the large room in my basement that we turned into a bedroom for our adult child perfectly and safely.

Name: Alexander Hardin
Summary: I was sent the wrong product and the one that I was sent is defective
Review: As you can see in the photo that I had to duct tape the safety switch down in order for the heater to work, such a waste of money. Don't buy this product.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Love the heater, heats better than i imagined. Small heater big heat output. Wonderful for keeping my camper warm on cold nights. Would definitely buy another one.

Name: Felix
Review: Not overly large and packs a punch. Was able to heat up a pretty sizable living room and kitchen area with this heater within half an hour.

Name: william bouman
Review: Works great heats a 12x12 room nicely..

Name: Monica M. Pietrowski
Review: I am very  happy with this tower heater...it can be stationary or have it oscillate.  and there is a large range of temperature for heat

Review: The unit turns off after one minute and never turns back on, would never repurchase or recommend this product for anyone

Name: David s
Review: It was ok until my utility bill went sky hi other wise good heat but it use a lot of electricity.

Name: Taylor Rhea
Review: Quiet, puts out plenty of heat which you can adjust! Perfect for the bedroom!

Name: DEAHYEON YU
Summary: I used it today and it works great !
Review: first day of using this and I like it

Name: Mom9504
Review: Perfect for my cold room.

Name: Gaye Adams
Review: There is no temperature control. It either runs constantly, or if you turn the dial just a little to much back, it doesn’t blow air at all!

Name: Emmanuel Mahlis
Review: Bought the heater to replace a Lasko one that burned my outlet.  The Trustech is lighter and smaller than the Lasko, but seems to work as advertised so far.  It's still new (have had it for only one week), but it warms the room nicely.

Name: Jonathan
Summary: It is not worth the money
Review: It is super loud, cheap design. This is the second time I bought the heater from this brand. Would not recommend it.

Name: Karlie
Review: Have had stronger space heaters, but it's nice for the money! It can occelate which is really nice.

Review: Defective out of the box, wouldn't even turn on.

Name: Liane S.
Review: Overall good product

Review: It's very weak noise level is moderate not great I returned it. Chinese product.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Stopped working after 3 months. Don't waste your money.

Name: Brooke peterson
Review: Amazing product! I love the timer option and how quite it is. Very satisfied with this fan!

Name: Abbigayle
Review: i do like it a lot! it warms me right up. i just wish they had a super low setting for when it gets too hot. but honestly, its perfect besides that! thank you

Name: Kyle Repaskey
Review: This product is quiet and generates heat rather quickly.  Definitely recommend.

Name: BF
Review: We needed a large enough space heater to heat up our break room when I came across this gem. It heats up the room quickly and the tip over feature is genius! Thumbs up :-)

Name: Katie Kuo
Review: Have a newborn and its been perfect in keeping our bedroom apartment the perfect temperature for us. Its quiet, doesn't smell, and the design looks and feels pleasant to use.

Name: Chloe
Review: Excellent product! Love this heater it helps survive the winter. High quality, the office become warm quite soon.  It is also very quiet while working. Highly recommend!

Name: Ryan
Review: I am updating my review because I have only had this heater for a year and it literally just caught on fire in my office.

Name: Yosif
Review: I am extremely satisfied with this product! It exceeded my expectations! Thank you!

Name: Neil Payne
Review: easy to use and heats up fast, great safety features that work

Name: Mengwei
Summary: rotary switch, three modes, hot enough
Review: It is super easy to use. There is a rotary switch. There is a low power heater, and a high power heater, and a cooling fan. Very convenient and useful. It is enough to use the low power this time in Boston.

Name: Christopher L.
Review: Good product

Name: Rubin
Summary: Doesn’t stay on when you need it to I hate it wish I never bought it
Review: Not happy with it at all

Name: Tony u
Review: Great heater it really warms my garage work area with ease. I’m so glad I found this product I would suggest to anyone to purchase.

Name: Andres Ceballos
Review: I really like this heater, they are safe and work perfectly.Most likely I am buying one or two more.

Name: Shari Flowers
Review: This heater works wonderfully! I purchased two and I am very pleased with the purchase. They heat quickly and efficiently and the oscillating feature distributes the heat through the space.

Name: OFallon School  District 90
Summary: Great value! Perfect for office setting.
Review: Our conference room doubles as our lunch room and it is always chilly.This heater makes it nice and cozy and hard to go back to work aftera relaxing lunch.Thanks Trust Tech

Review: Heats our master bedroom nicely.

Review: Would have liked to have thermostat calibrated to control room temperature.

Name: Carlos Marulanda
Review: To heat my room due to damage to the heating in my house

Name: Melissa Livanos
Review: I used the product for my drafty condo and it does work well and I like the size.  The amount of heat put out could be a bit more, but overall I do like it.

Name: nicole
Review: Lightweight and quiet

Name: Sergio Hernandez
Review: This product is awesome, works really fast and is the perfect size for an office or a small room.

Name: Drlarryg
Summary: Perfect heater for small (10 x 14) home office
Review: Great heater for small home office in my basement

Name: Abdullah Mamun
Review: Please do not buy it .it does not work properly.smell bad.

Name: Peggy Bowden
Review: We work in a shop environment so it gets pretty cold around here. We have one of these heaters at each station. Works great and keeps the employees warm. Would buy again

Name: Hub B.
Review: The TrustTech portable heater works great. I especially like the oscillating feature. It is lightweight to carry but a heavyweight on performance. It heated my office in no time!

Name: Kiki
Review: I loved this space eater. It is small but very powerful! Definitely worth the money! Thanks!

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: This heater is awesome, I use it to heat a 350 square foot space & it gets toasty.

Name: Dan lee Chalom Mampassi
Summary: I appreciate the quality and also its design.
Review: I like this product because apart from today I won’t freeze myself again as it was before. So I can warm my body when it gets cold and also use it during summer as well.

Review: Heats up a medium sized room in a matter of minutes and it's not too loud (think laptop fans on medium-high). Temperature gauge could use some actual numbers on it.

Name: Aprilsky
Summary: Sleek new look with little air flow
Review: This fan is all appearance and no real quality  function with circulating powerful air during Hot Summer months. The noise level and swivel rotation is the only good thing I can say about this unit. The first level is incredibly weak and the third level is a joke! Barely a slight breeze that flows on any of the 1-3 speed levels. Save your money for a Vornado! This Review is from a customer that wants to share an honest opinion and save your money for a much better unit. A new Sleek appearance is what drew me in. I have the unit in my daughter's room as a back up. Luckily her room is cool year round. Read the full description before making a purchase.

Name: mark_716
Review: Hi I purchased 2 of these one for each of my kids Room  Their rooms are on the 2nd floor and the heat just doesn't heat well up there so I bought this for the Winter to keep their rooms warm. The space heater does more than a perfect job keeping it warm. Hot even this thing is so powerful and warms the Room of very fast. I like that it has a tip over safety feature in case he gets knocked over. You can set a timer on it and it will shut off on its own which is perfect so you don't have to worry about it . Overall it is a great space heater, I highly recommend.

Name: Sandi Thompson
Review: I love this fan … it has so many options … it is on low and I can not hear it BUT can feel it … and it feels so good .. I love that it has the temp on it … love that it oscillates … I am very happy with this fan !!!

Name: K-B
Review: Ordered this to heat a 224 square foot area ... and it does a good of doing that. Its small footprint doesn't' take up a lot of room and it's quiet. The 2 heat settings allow for adjusting to temperature conditions and the oscillating helps to evenly heat the room. Overall, a good value for the price.

Review: Very quiet for an office setting.

Review: Lightweight and strong.

Name: liuandy
Summary: Mute constant temperature multi-protection electric heater
Review: This electric heater is very quiet when working. It can hardly hear the rotating noise. It is very important for quiet sleep. It has a constant temperature function. You don't have to worry about the temperature being too high or too low. The safest is the rollover protection function.  It is very practical for families with children.

Name: David
Summary: Smells "slightly odd" for about an hour but that's just plastic off-gassing.(Otherwise unplug it!)
Review: Works great so far. Heats up a 28ft x 22ft room with a mid sized window nicely. No smell either after the first hour of it running. The anti-tilt shut off works. It works so well that if the heater is not sitting flat on the floor it will keep it from turning on. After about 5 minutes if why won't my new product work I saw the button on the bottom of the heater. It was just stuck enough that the weight of the heater would not push it down at first. I pushed it down with my hand and after a click it began to run. I set it back down and it turned back on with no problems sense.As for the smell it does let off when it first runs, if it smells like burn plastic unplug it and return it for a different one. That only happens if something came loose inside of it and it got stuck to the heater element. Otherwise all plastic will off-gas when heated for the first few times making it smell odd. Should the smell bother you run it in a vented space till the smell goes away.(Took mine about 1 hour)

Name: huihui
Review: When I got this tower fan, OMG!What a fan! I couldn't be more satisfied with it! The design of the fan is so cool that it takes no space at all. The space reserved for the fan in our house is very small, but it is just right! And you can hardly imagine that such a lightweight tower fan can stay so cool for you! The whole family loves it!

Name: Romantic
Review: I needed a replacement for a tower heater that we'd had for several years. I got this one because the reviews were good and the features seemed to be what I was looking for. Nothing fancy about this unit, but it certainly puts out the heat. Warms up our kitchen, hallway, foyer, and living room. I haven't turned on the heater in the living room since starting use of this one. Nice!

Name: Emily
Review: I love this tower cooler fan, it’s so quiet and smooth!Make me feel so relax while I resting. The weather is getting hot lately so I wanted to buy a fan last month, I have tried the other one before, but the wind of that fan was super loud and it’s noisy make me couldn’t sleep all the time. So finally...... I decided to buy another one, after searching, I have chosen this one. The wind is very cool and very quiet, my dog and I can finally get a good night's sleep.Strongly recommend it to everyone who cares about their sleeping quality.

Name: Charlene A. Wrighton
Summary: It is good. I am happy with it. However....
Review: It doesn't work on carpet unless you put it on a book or something hard.It has a strong safey device at the bottom and the carpet will not work with it.Solution: a big book. Works great. It works great on tile or linoleum.

Name: Summer L.
Review: Defective and they won’t exchange or return it. It turns on, lights up, swings, let’s me press all the buttons, BUT NO AIR COMES OUT. What’s the point of having this if it literally doesn’t work at all and the company won’t respond to my exchange request. Extremely disappointed. Don’t recommend wasting your money on this.

Review: We bought this for our outdoor patio during mild cold evenings.  It also doubles as our backup heat in our RV.Great compact heater with the oscillation feature which we like.  Not as tall as some tower heaters.

Review: This little heater is best heater. Little n easy to use and puts out heat then the big heater my room is 20× 18 it heats it up usually in 1& half to 2 hed, my old heat I used to leave it on all night.

It even has a fan component, for when she starts complaining about the summer heat!  Great purchase and value!  Very easy to unpack & immediately use!
